review: I ended up in the infectious diseases department of the hospital with severe poisoning after I ordered a pate here. Terrible place. Please don't ever take any food here. ‚Ä¶
name: Vlada Derkach

review:
Tatiana, congratulations.
All products sold by the institution are guaranteed to be fresh.

We ask you to leave your contact details so that we can contact you and understand this situation in detail üôè

We add information to our previous words. Tatiana, we contacted you and talked about your condition and the reasons for this situation. Unfortunately, your review cannot contain 100% accurate information, as no evidence of poisoning was provided in our institution. You refused to talk to you personally and your doctor. We are ready to make every effort for your speedy recovery, but we believe that such serious allegations must be confirmed.

Responding to your add-on to the review:
Many reliable medical sources say: "The incubation period of Salmonella lasts about 4 days." In addition, the main products that cause this poisoning were not in the pate.
On this day, more than one unit of this dish was sold, but, except for you, no one contacted the institution about the poisoning.

Once again, we wish you a speedy recovery and that such situations never happen in your life.
The Vinsanto Wine Bar team ‚ù§Ô∏è

Hello!
1. All products and ingredients for our delicious dishes are purchased daily from the best suppliers and are enjoyed in the restaurant at a price corresponding to the quality.

We did not disregard your feedback and analyzed the situation. Indeed, events were planned in two halls and the bar employee politely warned you about this and offered to move to those tables where you could not keep track of your time. We consider this behavior of our employee to be correct. We also confirm that beer and cheese plate were ordered. Paying attention to the facts, you decided to settle in 6 minutes after serving the beer, 10 minutes after placing the order. At the time of calculation, your dish was ready and you were asked to pack it right there with you. Specify again the details of the events. When you return, we will be happy to offer you a bottle of beer as a compliment, if you introduce yourself correctly or write in pb on fb.
Thank you in advance!
